__e: Mr Collins is a man who makes you despair at the entire sex.
You obviously have a very different relationship with Collins than the others, and you miss it since he left?
Hey Collins, he barely lets me going anywhere with him and this time I'm going.
Mr Collins, I don't think you're saying anything to me.
Mr. Collins has nothing private to say to me!
- Okay. Just because Collins didn't talk doesn't mean the other three won't.
Agent Collins is at his house, siphoning his gas.
The phone number of my good friend Tom Collins is in there.
He thinks Collins is after him, too.
I know that, Mr. Collins, and I want to help you. Think.
Tom, you go to Collings Hill and around you go to river.
Your mother will never see you again if you do not marry Mr Collins, and I will never see you again if you do.
